io.mpos.provider
Interface ProviderOptionsFactory

public interface ProviderOptionsFactory

The provider options factory is used to create provider options for instantiating a new payment provider.

Since:
2.0.0

Method Summary
 ProviderOptions createProviderOptions(ProviderMode providerMode, java.lang.String merchantIdentifier, java.lang.String merchantSecretKey, java.util.EnumSet<TransactionAction> supportedActions)
          Returns new payment provider options that can be used to initialize a payment provider with the framework.
 

Method Detail

createProviderOptions

ProviderOptions createProviderOptions(ProviderMode providerMode,
                                      java.lang.String merchantIdentifier,
                                      java.lang.String merchantSecretKey,
                                      java.util.EnumSet<TransactionAction> supportedActions)
                                      throws MposRuntimeException
Returns new payment provider options that can be used to initialize a payment provider with the framework.

Parameters:
providerMode - The mode the server will run in.
merchantIdentifier - Merchant credentials
merchantSecretKey - Merchant credentials
supportedActions - The actions you support during a transaction workflow
Returns:
New provider options
Throws:
MposRuntimeException - If the parameters are not valid
Since:
2.0.0
